topic.title: XSD Topic Type Shell Tutorial
topic.shortdesc: This tutorial demonstrates the process of creating an XSD-syntax document type shell.

keywords.indexterm: document type shellXSD syntaxXSD syntaxdocument type shell

body.p: XSD document type shells use two XSD features to create complete XSD-based DITA document types: xs:include and xs:redefine. Includes are used to include components that are not being modified through redefine. Redefine is used to include components for which one or more groups defined in the component are being redefined, either to extend base groups with domain-provided element types or to restrict groups through constraint modules.
